creator.description: Labeller to show which (mostly UK) posters (mostly media/politics) on Bluesky went to private school, and what the current fees are for that school. Also check out @parents.blue  Problems? Reporting accounts? Report through BSky or Email mail@daddys.cash

locales.description: Their website lists no figures and describes 'an equitable tuition rate', and that 'Wingra School assume that parents have an obligation to finance their children’s education to the extent that they are able'. Other sources put fees at around $19,200/year
locales.name: Wingra School

locales.description: Now merged into Langley Prep School, charging £42,535/year
locales.name: Taverham Hall School

locales.description: Now merged into AKS Lytham, charging £17,724/year
locales.name: Arnold School
Academy of Our Lady of Mercy, Lauralton Hall
Mary Institute & St Louis Country Day School

locales.description: 23% of sitting MPs went to private schools, according to research by the Sutton Trust
locales.name: 23% Privately Educated

locales.description: 13% of sitting MPs have declared they earn a rental income over £10,000/year, according to analysis of the Register of Members Interests by LandlordZone. The true number of landlords is likely higher, as many may not reach the £10k threshold, or have obscured their rental income in other ways.
locales.name: 13% Landlords

locales.description: Now merged into Heathfield School, Ascot, charging £49,269/year
locales.name: St Mary's School, Wantage

locales.description: Now merged into Plymouth College, which charges £22,004/Year
locales.name: Dunstan's Abbey School

locales.description: Now merged into The Grammar School at Leeds, charging £17,523/year
locales.name: Leeds Girls' High School

locales.description: This person is in Epstein's Black Book or flight logs (checked on https://epsteinsblackbook.com) or has a mention of a connection to Epstein on their Wikipedia
locales.name: Epstein Connection

locales.description: This person is a landlord (admitted in article/post or on MPs register of interests)
locales.name: Landlord

locales.description: This person owns multiple houses (3 or more), but it's unclear as to whether they rent any of them out
locales.name: Possible Landlord

locales.description: Website is very vague about fees, but approximately $75,000/year
locales.name: United World College of the Atlantic

locales.description: Independent/Private school run as a Voluntary Grammar School - supported by alumni donations and some local authority funding but run independently of LEA and compares itself to other independent schools. £6,040year for prep department, £1,440/year for secondary department.
locales.name: Royal Belfast Academical Institution

locales.description: 62% of the House of Lords went to private school. For hereditary peers the figure is 98%
locales.name: 62% Privately Educated
Lycee Francais Charles de Gaulle de Londres

locales.description: Now merged with another school to form Redmaids School. Current fees £19,289/Year
locales.name: The Red Maid's School

locales.description: Closed in 1997. Fees info not available, government schools service lists it as Independent and Bevan describes as a boarding school
locales.name: St Hilda's, Whitby
Notting Hill and Ealing High School

locales.description: Now free, prior to 2014 was approx €10,000/year
locales.name: Gormanston College

locales.description: Someone spouting some kind of guff about how pointing out private school privilege is 'bigotry' or 'inverse snobbery' or something
locales.name: Moans about Richists

locales.description: in the words of the Evening Standard, Sam ‘Made his name as an in-house boffin for the private schools’ umbrella group, the Independent Schools Council.’
locales.name: Worked for the Independent Schools Council

locales.description: Worked for Michael Gove's Education Department as an advisor
locales.name: Worked for Michael Gove
Cathedral School of St John the Divine

locales.description: Private School Punks! Awarded for publicly Not Getting The Point
locales.name: Brewdog Award

locales.description: This person attended a private (fee-paying) school.
locales.name: Private School
